CustomField.description: If specified, the Quantity of the record this prices will be divided by this number and the remainder removed to get an actual Quantity. For example, if Tier Bundling is 10, that means that any number between 1 and 10 will be treated as 1, between 11 and 20 as 2, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If specified, the Quantity will be divided by this number and the remainder removed to get an actual Quantity. For example, if Tier Bundling is 10, that means that any number between 1 and 10 will be treated as 1, between 11 and 20 as 2, etc.
CustomField.label: Tier Bundling
